tourBios.carHigh:
Has four wins on the Dakotas Tour, and dozens of top-five finishes on the eGolf, Gateway and Dakotas Tours.

2013: Played nine events on PGA TOUR Canada, making cuts (T46 at the Dakota Dunes Open and T19 at The Syncrude Boreal Open) in his second and third starts... Missed the cut in the other seven. Finished 96th on the Order of Merit.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Two-time all-state golfer in 1999 and 2000...Was a four-time All-American, four-time all-district, four-time all-conference and member of 2004 NCAA Division III national championship team...Shot 62 in final round of Minnesota State Open.
tourBios.personal: Attended River Falls (Wisc.) High School...Favorite course he's played is Pinehurst No. 2 and East Lake CC in Atlanta...Would like to play Augusta National...Favorite teams are the Minnesota Gophers and the Minnesota Twins...Favorite entertainer is Martin Sexton...Favorite city is Chicago.....If not a professional golfer, he would be a doctor...Has held jobs as bartender and as an H&R Block tax pro...Twitter name is @neilpjohnson.

tourBios.carHigh: 2015: T40th at California's Q-School, earning conditional status for the Mackenzie Tour's season.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Shot 62 in final round of Minnesota State Open.
tourBios.personal: Previously worked as a Tax Pro at H&R Block...Olympic Club is his favorite course and hopes to play Augusta National...Favorite sports teams are the Minnesota Wild and Twins...Twitter name is @neilpjohnson.

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 46th on the Web.com Tour 2 times.
